pages.text: Warneticaris is phyllocarid crustacean known mostly from Silurian. With a tail spine reaching 20cm, it is the largerst phyllocarid ever known, estimating this animal reached near a meter. Although it was once considered to be synonymous with Schugurocaris, its morphology is closer to Ceratiocaris.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
